titleStmt.title: A speech delivered by the King of Poland to his army before the battle, September 12th, 1683
Harangue du roy de Pologne a son armeé avant le combat, le 12 du mois de Septembre, 1683. English
titleStmt.author: John III Sobieski, King of Poland, 1629-1696.

notesStmt.note: French version of speech on verso: Harangue du roy de Pologne a son armeé avant le combat, le 12 du mois de Septembre, 1683.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
